name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Golang Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing scalable and high-performance applications, proficient in **Golang**, **Kubernetes**, and **Microservices** architecture. Skilled in building and deploying **API**-driven services within **Distributed Systems**, employing **Continuous Integration** practices and **Version Control** systems to enhance collaboration and code quality.
Expertise in creating reliable, compliant applications, ensuring alignment with industry standards while leveraging strong problem-solving and collaboration skills. Demonstrated success in employing **open-source** solutions and methodologies to enhance software development processes. Strong background in full-stack development with a proven track record using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, along with experience in AI/ML platforms for predictive analytics, integrated with cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure**.
